key.name: data
key.description: Application additional data. Should not be changed by user. Format: JSON.

key.name: query-limit
key.description: The limit of select query in the query, get 500 rows max for each query

key.name: query-timeout
key.summary: Time out before cancel a statement
key.description: If query's time is larger than this value (in seconds), application will cancel it.

key.name: connection-timeout
key.description: If time to connect to database is larger than this value (in seconds), application will cancel it.

key.name: color-scheme
key.description: Editor color scheme supported by Gtk Source View 5

key.name: auto-uppercase
key.description: Auto UpperCase keywords like SELECT, FROM, WHERE, etc.

key.name: auto-completion
key.description: Auto Completion for keywords, table names, column names, etc.

key.name: auto-exec-history
key.description: Auto Execute History Query when activated, instead of showing the query in the editor.
